comment.author: 57201473@N00
comment._content:
The Bull Moose party was another name for the United States Progressive Party of 1912 and was a political party created in the United States by a split in the Republican Party in the presidential election of 1912. It was formed by Theodore Roosevelt when he lost the Republican nomination to Howard Taft and pulled his delegates out of the convention.

Info gained from wikipedia
